fields.name: Civil Petition
fields.description: Template for filing civil petitions in court
fields.legal_requirements: This petition must be accompanied by required court fees, affidavit, and supporting documents as per CPC provisions.

fields.name: Bail Application
fields.description: Application for bail in criminal matters
fields.legal_requirements: Bail application must comply with Section 437/439 CrPC. Required documents: Copy of FIR, Charge sheet (if filed), Previous bail applications (if any).
